markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Chromatic Jellyfish Oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1959)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made from several oils of differing hues extracted from jellyfish and rare plants, the layers of chromatic jellyfish oil stack to form a rainbow within their vial. For 10 minutes after consuming chromatic jellyfish oil, you gain resistance to precision damage and extra damage from critical hits according to the jellyfish oil's type. While the effect lasts, you ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), and you can move 5 feet per round when you successfully Squeeze (or 10 feet per round on a critical success). You can also [Crawl](/Actions.aspx?ID=76) at half your Speed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>

<traits>

**Price** 120 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The oil grants resistance 5.

pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

</traits>

**Price** 800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The oil grants resistance 10.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Chromatic Jellyfish Oil (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 5,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The oil grants resistance 15.
